page.title: 01FARMING IN BURSCOUGH
page.content: There are 17 farms in the area we have been studying. Information was obtained for: TYRERS FARM:Has 100 acres of land and grows potatoes,barley and carrots.Keeps cows and sheep. SANDYWAYS FARM:Has 80 acres of land and grows sugar-beet,wheat,barley and potatoes.Keeps cows and sheep. NEW HOUSE FARM:Has 1000 acres of land and grows corn,carrots,sweedes,cereal, barley,white turnips,peas,cabbage, lettuce and cauliflower. CARR HALL FARM:Has 80 acres of land and grows barley,potatoes,carrots and cabbage. CARR LANE FARM:Has 26 acres and grows barley,cauliflower and sprouts. HENRYS FARM:Has 20 acres of land and grows potatoes,lettuce and corn.
